title: (x) A real challenge? / Angular sans - Amarillo USAF {Stavros}
content:
Apologies for the quality, thanks in advance.

author: doj

comments.content: That looks like Amarillo USAF available from [www.tlai.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20100308000453/http:/www.tlai.com/ "www.tlai.com"). Amarillo USAF is an aircraft marking font that duplicates the lettering specification used for current US Air Force aircraft.
